words.source: H7200 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of רָאָה 'to see'; KJV 'saw', ESV 'saw', NASB 'saw'
H6547 proper name; all trans. agree
H3588 conj. ki 'that, because, for'; KJV 'that', ESV 'that', NASB 'that'
H1961 Qal perf. 3fs of הָיָה 'to be, become'; KJV 'there was', ESV 'there was', NASB 'there was'
H7309 art. + n.fs revachah 'relief, respite'; KJV 'respite', ESV 'a respite', NASB 'relief'
H3513 conj. + Hiphil inf. abs. of כָּבֵד 'to be heavy'; KJV 'hardened', ESV 'hardened', NASB 'hardened'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English
H3820 n.ms construct lev 'heart' + 3ms suff.; KJV 'his heart', ESV 'his heart', NASB 'his heart'
H3808 conj. + neg. particle loʾ 'not'; KJV 'neither did he', ESV 'and did not', NASB 'and he did not'
H8085 Qal perf. 3ms of שָׁמַע 'to hear, listen'; KJV 'hearken', ESV 'listen', NASB 'listen'
H413 prep. ʾel 'to' + 3mp suff.; KJV 'unto them', ESV 'to them', NASB 'to them'
H834 prep. k- + rel. pron. ʾasher 'just as'; KJV 'as', ESV 'as', NASB 'just as'
H1696 Piel perf. 3ms of דָּבַר 'to speak'; KJV 'had said', ESV 'had said', NASB 'had said'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
